ComicInfo.Summary:
The team grieves, but it's time to get back into action! The team infiltrates a Harbinger base to find out what could be disrupting their cybernetic implants and come face to face with technological wizard Earl "Midnight" Simkus and the Star Squad. Plus, could Superstar's death have been an inside job?
First appearances:
- Midnight Earl (Earl Simkus)
- Star Soldiers
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/the-hard-corps-14-the-trouble-with-midnight/4000-148645/

ComicInfo.Title: The Trouble With Midnight
